data.lyric:
[ti:Lie]
[ar:NF]
[al:Perception]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lie - NF
[00:00.41]Written by：Nate Feuerstein/Tommee Profitt/Mike Elizondo, Jr.
[00:00.83]I heard you told your friends that I'm just not your type
[00:05.58]If that's how you really feel then why'd you call last night
[00:10.67]You say all I ever do is just control your life
[00:15.46]But how you gonna lie like that how you gonna lie like that
[00:20.26]
[00:21.16]Yeah I heard you said I ain't the type for you
[00:24.06]I don't regret it though I learned from it
[00:26.04]They should have you locked up for all the time you stole from us woo
[00:28.59]
[00:29.20]Took you out when I had no money
[00:30.88]Only person that you ever cared about was you that's why it's so funny
[00:34.07]You want somebody that'll keep you warm at night then
[00:36.26]Tell me why you actin' cold to me
[00:37.84]You ain't the only one to blame no one the one that made you rich
[00:40.68]When I bought every lie you sold to me
[00:42.37]Yeah heard you threw away the pictures
[00:44.44]But you still got the memories of us so I guess
[00:46.66]I don't really make a difference
[00:48.17]Flippin' through 'em in your head
[00:49.56]Got you texting me all hours of the night
[00:51.32]Yeah you told me that you needed distance
[00:53.13]What's the deal with you
[00:54.55]You say you want a man that keeps it real
[00:56.30]Then why you mad when I get real with you
[00:58.06]You want someone to pay the bills for you
[00:59.98]Went from failin' you now I feel for you liar
[01:01.95]I heard you told your friends that I'm just not your type
[01:06.09]If that's how you really feel then why'd you call last night
[01:11.13]You say all I ever do is just control your life
[01:16.07]But how you gonna lie like that how you gonna lie like that
[01:20.82]
[01:22.41]Look let me guess you want to stay friends
[01:24.73]Tellin' people that's how we been
[01:26.57]Tellin' everybody that yeah that we was barely speakin'
[01:28.53]
[01:29.13]Ah that's kinda funny why'd you call me every day then
[01:31.61]It's immaturity you goin' off the deep end
[01:34.19]You just want somebody you can chill and get some drinks with cool
[01:37.37]Then don't hit me on the weekend tellin' me
[01:39.53]You missed the way we talked and now I listen yeah
[01:42.52]
[01:43.16]Why you playin' with my mind huh
[01:45.01]Why you playin' with my time huh
[01:46.73]Told me we should let it go and put it all behind us
[01:49.21]That's what I did now you askin' me what I done I was
[01:52.13]
[01:52.91]Waitin' for this day I saw it comin'
[01:54.65]I think you just like attention tryna tell me all your problems
[01:57.05]I got issues of my own I ain't got time for all this drama
[01:59.61]You told me that you don't really wanna talk then why you callin' huh
[02:02.25]I heard you told your friends that I'm just not your type
[02:06.71]If that's how you really feel then why'd you call last night
[02:11.69]You say all I ever do is just control your life
[02:16.69]But how you gonna lie like that how you gonna lie like that
[02:21.45]
[02:23.91]How you gonna lie how you gonna lie like that
[02:27.89]
[02:28.78]Baby how you gonna lie how you gonna lie like that
[02:32.77]
[02:33.36]How you gonna lie baby how you gonna lie like that
[02:37.93]
[02:39.38]No no how you gonna lie like that
[02:42.97]I heard you told your friends that I'm just not your type
[02:46.70]
[02:47.65]If that's how you really feel then why'd you call last night
[02:51.72]
[02:52.39]You say all I ever do is just control your life
[02:57.21]But how you gonna lie like that how you gonna lie like that
[03:01.91]
[03:06.59]Tell me how you 'bout to lie like that
[03:08.61]
[03:11.61]Tell me how you 'bout to lie like
[03:13.33]
[03:16.54]Yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Lie]
[ar:NF]
[al:Perception]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.41]//
[00:00.83]我听说你告诉你的朋友 说我不是你喜欢的类型
[00:05.58]如果你真的这样想 那昨晚你为何给我打电话
[00:10.67]你说我只是想控制你的人生
[00:15.46]但你要怎样撒这个谎 你要怎样撒这个谎
[00:20.26]
[00:21.16]我听说你说我不是你喜欢的类型
[00:24.06]不过我不难过 我从中吸取了教训
[00:26.04]你浪费了我们这么多时间 你应该被关起来
[00:28.59]
[00:29.20]当初我一贫如洗也带你出去玩
[00:30.88]你在乎的只有你自己 所以这事情就很搞笑了
[00:34.07]你想要一个人温暖你的夜 那么
[00:36.26]告诉我 你为什么对我如此冰冷
[00:37.84]不是你一个人的错 不 是我让你膨胀了
[00:40.68]因为我接受了你撒的每一个谎
[00:42.37]听说你扔掉了我们的照片
[00:44.44]但我们之间的回忆你扔不掉 所以我觉得
[00:46.66]我真的不重要
[00:48.17]那些回忆在你脑海中不断闪过
[00:49.56]让你彻夜不停地给我发信息
[00:51.32]你说过你需要一点私人空间
[00:53.13]现在你是怎么回事
[00:54.55]你说你想要一个认真的男人
[00:56.30]那我对你认真的时候 你为何不高兴了
[00:58.06]你想要一个帮你付钱的人
[00:59.98]一开始我为你心动 如今我为你心痛 骗子
[01:01.95]我听说你告诉你的朋友 说我不是你喜欢的类型
[01:06.09]如果你真的这样想 那昨晚你为何给我打电话
[01:11.13]你说我只是想控制你的人生
[01:16.07]但你要怎样撒这个谎 你要怎样撒这个谎
[01:20.82]
[01:22.41]让我猜猜 你是不是想继续做朋友
[01:24.73]然后告诉别人我们一直都只是朋友
[01:26.57]告诉所有人我们从来都没怎么说话
[01:28.53]
[01:29.13]有点搞笑 那你为何每天都给我打电话呢
[01:31.61]幼稚 你无理取闹
[01:34.19]你只是想找个人陪你玩 陪你喝酒 行吧
[01:37.37]那周末就别找我 更别说什么
[01:39.53]你怀念我们聊天的氛围 喜欢我侧耳倾听的样子
[01:42.52]
[01:43.16]为何你要玩弄我的感情
[01:45.01]为何你要浪费我的时间
[01:46.73]你说过 我们应该放下过去 大步向前
[01:49.21]所以我就这样做了 如今你却责怪我
[01:52.13]
[01:52.91]我等这一天好久了 我知道这一天终将来临
[01:54.65]我觉得你只是喜欢被人关注 想把你所有困难都告诉我
[01:57.05]但我也有自己的问题要处理 没时间跟你演这场戏
[01:59.61]你说过不想和我谈 那为何你又打电话来了
[02:02.25]我听说你告诉你的朋友 说我不是你喜欢的类型
[02:06.71]如果你真的这样想 那昨晚你为何给我打电话
[02:11.69]你说我只是想控制你的人生
[02:16.69]但你要怎样撒这个谎 你要怎样撒这个谎
[02:21.45]
[02:23.91]你要怎样撒这个谎 你要怎样撒这个谎
[02:27.89]
[02:28.78]宝贝 你要怎样撒这个谎 你要怎样撒这个谎
[02:32.77]
[02:33.36]你要怎样撒这个谎 宝贝 你要怎样撒这个谎
[02:37.93]
[02:39.38]你要怎样撒这个谎
[02:42.97]我听说你告诉你的朋友 说我不是你喜欢的类型
[02:46.70]
[02:47.65]如果你真的这样想 那昨晚你为何给我打电话
[02:51.72]
[02:52.39]你说我只是想控制你的人生
[02:57.21]但你要怎样撒这个谎 你要怎样撒这个谎
[03:01.91]
[03:06.59]告诉我你要如何撒这个谎
[03:08.61]
[03:11.61]告诉我你要如何撒这个谎
[03:13.33]
[03:16.54]//
